abstract.p: Brian Mahoney to do Manhattan College basketball games as radio commentator (S)

block.p: BRIAN MAHONEY will be back on the sideline working college basketball games this season, but not as a head coach -- as a color commentator.

Mahoney, who coached St. John's basketball team for four seasons before he was dismissed at the end of the 1995-96 season, will sit behind the microphone for WFAS-AM (1230), which broadcasts Manhattan College basketball games. Mahoney, who will team with JOEL BLUMBERG, replaces SANDY DIAMOND, who is leaving to host ''The FRAN FRASCHILLA Show'' on WEVD-AM (1050).
